snippet: The organization refuted accusations of improprieties in its first statement since its chairman, Ronald O. Perelman, announced he would step down.
abstract: Top trustees at Carnegie Hall send letter to rest of board refuting departing chairman Ronald O Perelman's claims that they have failed to respond to his concerns about executive and artistic director Clive Gillinson; Perelman has accused Gillinson of improprieties, which he vigorously denies.
lead_paragraph: The organization refuted accusations of improprieties in its first statement since its chairman, Ronald O. Perelman, announced he would step down.

headline.main: Top Trustees at Carnegie Hall Deny Ronald Perelman’s Charges
headline.print_headline: Top Trustees at Carnegie Hall Deny Charges
